name: Morgan & West: More Magic for Kids! (Bigger, bolder, and more brilliant than before!)

shows.title: Morgan & West: More Magic for Kids! (Bigger, bolder, and more brilliant than before!)
shows.desc:
Time-travelling magicians Morgan & West return to the stage with a marvellous magic show full of crazy capers for the young, old and everyone in between! Can our duo of deception finally find fame, fortune, and a box of fondant fancies?

Age Recommendation: 5+
Run Time: 60 mins

Morgan & West have performed in their own magic shows and festivals all over the world since 2009.
